item.title: [Python] Hashing algorithm for determining the same image
item.description: #Introduction When creating a machine learning dataset based on images collected from the internet, it is necessary to delete duplicate images. It is still good if there are duplicate images in the training data, but if there are duplicate images between the training data and the test data, so-called leakage will occur. The simplest way to detect duplicate images is to use the hash value of a file such as MD5.
